com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.utils

Class EntityGroupingUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.utils.EntityGroupingUtil
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntityPropertyUtil

    public class EntityGroupingUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains entity naming and grouping functions to categorize entities
